purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 41st IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2025), which will take place in Auckland, New Zealand from September 7 to September 12, 2025. It invites researchers and practitioners to join for a global exchange of ideas and highlights the program features, including cutting-edge research, keynotes, panels, and networking opportunities. Additionally, it encourages student volunteers to apply and mentions travel support for US-based attendees. The conference aims to be environmentally conscious and socially inclusive, providing discount codes for travel and accommodations.
